casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kawamie Shonta COLE. No. 378P09-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

Jason T. Campbell, Assistant Attorney General.

Kawamie Shonta Cole, Lillington, for Cole, Kawamie Shonta. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of October 2015 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Writ of Certiorari with Addendum:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
